metadata.dc:author: Salazar Villa, R M
Mej√≠a Ortega, J
metadata.dc:description: This report includes a partial interpretation of the possible mechanisms of action related with the efficacy of specific immunotherapy with allergens. This cannot be explained by only one mechanism which regulates the immune reaction, which is why there is the relief that there is a large field in immunology which has yet to be explore.
metadata.dc:title: La inmunoterapia en la alergia.
[Immunotherapy in allergy].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista alergia : organo oficial de la Sociedad Mexicana de Alergia e Inmunlogia
